channel.title: InfinitePK
channel.description:
This topic was made, in order to advertise the features, and benefits of playing InfinitePK
InfinitePK is a long-term, 24/7 pk server. InfinitePK is not an economy server, you must train, and kill monsters / players to succeed in this game. InfinitePK follows a list of [url=http://www.infinitepk.com/misc.php?action=rules]rules[/url], that are enforced but not strict. InfinitePK is owned, and hosted on a (Dedicated Server) By : Z2 InfinitePK is based off of RSCD, and has been coded + debugged for months now.
The Infinitepk staff does not discriminate, or benefit friends/foes in any way, [u]period[/u].
If you would like to contact z2, or any other staff member you must navigate to their personal/public profile through the InfinitePK forums.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [b]Server Information, etc..[/b]
Experience rate : 35X Drop rate : Pretty high, no exact percentage. Over time, we lower it so the economy isn't ruined
How do i earn some cash? : Since this is a pvp/pk server, you must obtain your items/cash by the items that npc's drop.. we highly suggest you make a main, then a pure/staker afterward! Reason why, your flats/main will have no problem slaying the high level monsters, etc..
Do i have a chance at joining the staff? : There will be a staff application section on the forum, but they arent actively checked. You have higher chances being noticed by the administrators, rather than submitting an application.
Is autoing allowed? : No, autoing is not allowed.. and you will be caught. The packets sent using ausbot, or any type of old rsc bot are logged and automatically banned by the server.. we do not suggest you try it.
Is scamming allowed? : No, you are a failure if you scam your friends on a rsc server, we WILL ban you.
Is multi logging allowed? : Yes, we do not mind that you multi log, seeing as when you say "Its my bro, not me" It really could be.
Is it bad to pk with my clan, and rape noobs / low levels that are innocently training in the wilderness? : No, that is exactly what the wilderness is for. While the wilderness may be benefitful, it risks your items aswell.
Does prayer, and the godspells work? : Yeah, all prayers, ranging, and mage spells are [u]PERFECT[/u]
Will donating get me rares? : Yes, depending on the amount that you donate!
If i donate, and recieve a rare/item, will other non-donators get them? : No, only donators will be given the item they paid for, however we have no control over the death / loss of a donator's rare(s).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [b]Server Pictures/Screenshots[/b] *Note : [b] These pictures have yet to be labeled with descriptions[/b]..
[b]Screenshots have been gathered by one of the players.[/b]
[img]http://bankhead-network.com/images/screenshot1.png[/img] [img]http://bankhead-network.com/images/screenshot2.png[/img] [img]http://bankhead-network.com/images/screenshot3.png[/img] [img]http://bankhead-network.com/images/screenshot4.png[/img] [img]http://bankhead-network.com/images/screenshot5.png[/img] [img]http://bankhead-network.com/images/screenshot6.png[/img] [img]http://bankhead-network.com/images/screenshot7.png[/img]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
*Note : [b] The info will be updated accordingly as the server continues to update[/b].. *Note : [b] If you would like to submit some pictures, or info to this thread please pm me[/b]..
Website = In my profile
Thank you, for reading the information topic for iPK

[quote=“kF, post:33, topic:297327”][quote author=z2 link=topic=393365.msg2943136#msg2943136 date=1252027346]

why the fuck is this shit still allowed to be advertised? same thing with fusionpk, both of these fucking sodomites ddos other servers and none of the mods give a shit.

Why the fuck are u posting on my topic twice with the same useless shit that isn’t true?
[/quote]

prove me wrong[/quote]

I don’t see any supporting evidence from you, so I would just calm down with the accusations. Especially asking someone to prove that they “don’t” ddos when there’s no real proof that he does.

item.title: InfinitePK
item.dc:creator: @z21 z2
item.description:
@z21 wrote:

[quote=“trollmuch, post:19, topic:297327”][quote author=z2 link=topic=393365.msg2934264#msg2934264 date=1251470832]

No need to state my opinion

No point in this server being up whatsoever.

No need to state your opinion but you give it anyways? Real smart. To everyone else stop spamming this topic with this useless shit since Timebandit told eric that people were talking about ddosing his server when I was in the AFK channel of a vent server, so apparently I get brought into this because I was in the vent period even though I was AFK. Mods please clean the topic up and give warnings if necessary.

FACT.
This server HAD potential, until z2 showed another utter example of what this community is made of. Unsurprisingly, another one bites the dust.

Thank you…

I would ask for all these posts accusing you of being part of ddosing KPK to be cleaned up, too

Right?

Well im not the one ddosing shit, ask anyone who knows me I don’t have a botnet nor any type of ddosing program. So you need to stop trying to talk shit when you know nothing.

Hi bankhead, seen you around DARScape a bit.

I hope you don’t think im bankhead?
[/quote]
No you directly dont have access to a botnet but you had part of kingpk going down the first time. And are very associated with people who attack other servers… aka more up time for your server more down time for other as you ask them to hit.[/quote]
Cool I am friends with people who have the ability to take down servers, it doesn’t mean I tell them to take down other servers period. I played your server so why would I have people take it down? I don’t want to “get rid of competition”, I think people should be able to play whatever server they want so enough of your bullshit that you know nothing about eric.

Johnisriot:

Lol k. You figured your server advertisement would be deleted due to you having part of it, so you’d have to make up a bunch of bullshit, hell, I would too

Read what eric says, I have no way to attack servers.

Read full topic
